1.name: One-Way
1.description: Does not connect back to this area

2.name: No Entry
2.description: Cannot be entered from this area

4.name: Unlock
4.description: Unlocks access to this area from the opposite entrance

16.name: Dead End
16.description: Leads to an isolated section of the opposite side

32.name: Isolated
32.description: Isolated location only accessible from the opposite side

64.name: Effect
64.description: Can be accessed with the following effect(s): {0}

512.name: Shortcut
512.description: Telephone serves as a shortcut back to the area when used

1024.name: Exit Point
1024.description: Telephone takes you here when used from the opposite area

4096.name: Inaccessible
4096.description: Cannot be accessed in the current version of the game
